Uses of Package
com.octo.captcha.image

Packages that use com.octo.captcha.image
com.octo.captcha.image Package for implementations of Pix Captchas : Captcha with pics chalenges. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy This package a struture for implementing gimpys
A gimpy is PixCaptcha with the question "Spell the word".
